de.ralleytn.api.gamejolt

Class GameJolt

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.api.gamejolt.GameJolt

  • public class GameJolt
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the interface between the client program and GameJolt.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String user_token)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  GameJoltException,
                  de.ralleytn.simple.json.JSONParseException
        Authenticates a user. If authentication failed a ServiceException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        user_token - the token of the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something went wrong during the data transfer
        de.ralleytn.simple.json.JSONParseException - if the JSON data could not be parsed
        GameJoltException - if the service says something went wrong
        Since:
        1.0.0
